channel.title: Random crashes when i activate fan
channel.description:
Im getting random crashes when i activate the fan sometimes it gives me : fatal error message box or just hl2.exe has stopped working
Anyway to fix? here are my specs : Intel Core i7 2600k 3.4ghz GTX 690 16GB Ram
thanks. EDIT: FIXED WHEN I PUT PROCESS TO HIGH PRIORITY. dont need any more help, thanks :slight_smile:

item.title: Random crashes when i activate fan
item.dc:creator: jay-way
item.description:
I’ve the same issue @ the fan bit. I included the crash reports in my post. Hope it will be resolved soon.

Cheers!

edit - just realized OP changed post and said changing process to high priority fixes it - that didn’t work for me… Still crashing
